name: Pépito
description:
an autobiographical sadness for TwitsyBot Jam, partially about @PépitoTheCat, partially about my own experience with pets in 2018.

content warning: pet death

---

thank you to Adam for making Bitsy, and Sean for hacking it, and Lenny for the Bitsy FAQ

and thank you to Emma for running the jam

---

in memory of Molly and Pippa, two good dogs

---

take care, Pépito
